item.title: my first post
item.description: ðŸ“„ Summary of the Paper Title: Connecting chemical and protein sequence space to predict biocatalytic reactions Objective: To enable the prediction of compatible enzyme-substrate pairs for biocatalytic reactions, reducing reliance on trial-and-error experimentation. Approach: Library Construction (akGLib1): Curated a diverse library of 314 Î±-KG-dependent NHI enzymes from over 265,000 sequences using bioinformatics tools (e.g., EFI-EST, sequence similarity networks). Ensured high sequence diversity (average identity: 13.7%) and included both characterized and uncharacterized enzymes. High-Throughput Experimentation:
